name: Sorel Yoot Pac Nylon Winter Boots - Youths
description: Classic cold-weather boots for young outdoor enthusiasts (yoots).Uppers are seam-sealed nylon backed with a waterproof membrane.Insulated with removable 9mm washable, recycled felt inner boots.25mm bonded felt frost plugs prevents the cold from penetrating from the ground.Sherpa pile snow cuffs.Outsoles are waterproof vulcanized rubber with a grippy herringbone pattern that maintains flexibility in the cold.
